  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Initialise a new Game. Sets the starting level to Level 1 and adds into the view the player's character at a size window of 500 x 500 It adds all the event listeners such as for movement, shooting and pausing the game. It also loads all the GUI menus in case they are ever called.

  • Method Details

    • gameStart

      public void gameStart()
      Runs when the player selects start on the start screen menu. This removes the start screen menu, replaces it with the game and starts them at Level 1. It sets the game state as playing so that the pause gui will not show. It also loads the music track for Level 1 on a loop.

    • getCreds

      public int getCreds()
      Method that finds the credits variable and returns that value
      Returns:
      credits is the part that the system will send back. (example: credits = 2)
